title: Is it possible to use PBE in the LCU client?
body: Title,oh and sorry if I posted it in the wrong category.

replies.body:
The PBE has its own Alpha Client, so *kind of yes*? However, if you mean the **Live version** of the Alpha Client, then no. The clients for the PBE and Live environments are **completely separate**. 

I hope that helped answer your question.
